Sentencas: The X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) spectra of a series of ceria samples doped with trivalent rare earth oxide have been measured at the L-III edges of the dopants and the cerium.
Titulo: X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) measurements of ceria-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: These spectra give information on the valency of the excited atom and the geometric structure of the direct neighborhood of this atom.
Titulo: X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) measurements of ceria-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: By comparing the XANES spectra of the dopants with those of the pure oxides, differences in thr way the dopants are incorporated into the ceria lattice can be observed.
Titulo: X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) measurements of ceria-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: These differences together with the mismatch of the ionic radii of the dopants compared to Ce, seem to be responsible for the decreasing ionic conductivity of the lighter rare earth dopants.
Titulo: X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) measurements of ceria-based solid electrolytes

Sentencas: For Pr, the spectra indicate a partial oxidation to Pr-44 leading to a reduced conductivity.
Titulo: X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) measurements of ceria-based solid electrolytes
